attributes.action: Stop all children under the age of 18 to receive the COVID-19 vaccination.
attributes.additional_details: Because it is not healthy to inject a child’s body with a vaccine while their body is still developing and the vaccines side effects are mostly unknown
attributes.background: Stop all children under the age of 18 to receive the vaccine as their bodies are still developing and this vaccine hasn’t had as much research and trials done as any other vaccine.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586017
